originalText.text: Beware the security personnel will choose who goes in and who doesn’t, based on his egoistic judgement. My family member and I had an appointment, he then chose to let only my family member in who had his name on the appointment and pushed me out to stand in the rain. While I see him allowing a party of two or three people in together with one appointment. When I asked him why are you allowing them in, his response “it is none of your business” when I addressed this to his supervisor, the response was “we only let one person in who has the appointment” then when I told him this not the case and showed him videos of his employee allowing people in together, he didn’t know what to say and kept lying. Called this company to complain nothing was done, the guy kept apologizing. Seems that this company doesn’t have any value and integrity which reflects the type and quality of individuals they hire as security personnel at the college point DMV! Very unprofessional, disrespectful and practice discrimination! The supervisor seems to be covering for his disrespectful employee and does not want to break his employees ego as he continued to single me out. The supervisor continued to lie and allow the wrong doing of his employee! If one person is doing wrong your out of luck complaining cause they are all in alliance to have the same demeanor and carry the same wrong actions! They will be reported to the Better Business Bureau!

originalText.text: This company is actually going downhill. Margie should be removed from her position in the office because she not only will screw people over but don't know how to talk to people with respect. Her attitude is nasty and she curses people out. She even accused me of lying when I really needed to take a day off for a personal reason!!!!!
